item.title: just_audio : An audio player plugin for Android, iOS, macOS, web, Linux and Windows.
item.description: What is just_audio Plugin for Flutter just_audio is a feature-rich audio player for Android, iOS, macOS, web, Linux and Windows. Installation Add dependency Add this to your package’s pubspec.ymal file: dependencies: just_audio: ^0.9.29 Install package from command line flutter pub add just_audio Import Package import 'package:just_audio/just_audio.dart'; Platform specific configuration Android Add the following to your AndroidManifest.xml file to enable your app to access audio files online. <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" /> Add the following attribute to the application element if you want to connect to non-HTTPS URLs or if you employ a functionality that relies on the proxy, including headers, caching, or streaming audio sources:

item.title: Dio | Powerfull Http Client for flutter
item.description: What is Dio? Dio is a powerful Http client for Dart, which supports Interceptors, Global configuration, FormData, Request Cancellation, File downloading, Timeout etc. It is very simple to use. import 'package:dio/dio.dart'; void getHttp() async { try { var response = await Dio().get('http://www.google.com'); print(response); } catch (e) { print(e); } } Installation Updateing pubspec.yaml dependencies: dio: ^4.0.0 Using flutter pub flutter pub add dio Using dart pub dart pub add dio Now import dio in your dart file like:

item.title: Flutter: Spinkit Plugin | Collection of animated loading indicators
item.description: Spinkit Plugin A collection of loading indicators animated with flutter. Installation Let’s look at different ways to install and use the flutter spinkit plugin Add dependency Add this to your package’s pubspec.ymal file: dependencies: flutter_spinkit: ^5.2.0 Install package from command line flutter pub add flutter_spinkit Import Package import 'package:flutter_spinkit/flutter_spinkit.dart'; Usage Add these to any widget as a child: SpinKitRotatingCircle( color: Colors.white, size: 50.0, ), SpinKitDoubleBounce( color: Colors.white, size: 50.0, ), SpinKitWave( color: Colors.
